scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules && rm -rf server/node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf client/package-lock.json && rm -rf server/package-lock.json
scripts.setup: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.build:all: npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.build:full: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.lint: cd client && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint
scripts.test: cd client && npm test && cd ../server && npm test
